reviews.title: Four maps
reviews.comment: This is four maps that are widely available on the Internet.  It is nice to have them available on my phone, but the only interactivity is switching between the maps. You can\'t turn various categories on and off. There\'s no search either.   There\'s a map with a bunch of unlabeled icons (no map key but they\'re easy enough to figure out), a map showing hidden items, a map showing the four sections of Steelport, and a map showing gang operation locations.
reviews.author: John Lafornara

reviews.title: Simply Superb
reviews.comment: This app is to use and it\'s so helpful I just put it beside my pc on the mobile hanger and keep playing , I plays 4 hours a day on saints row
reviews.author: Damon Janvier

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I was a little hesitant of trying this because of no reviews, but it works really well as a pocket map. An option to mark individual  hidden items as found, or to be able to simply remove the dot from the map, would be nice. But still 5/5.
reviews.author: Robbie Davis

reviews.title: Hidden Jem
reviews.comment: It\'s actually pretty useful. It helped me get the Platinum trophy.
reviews.author: Averyhandsome Sloth
